name: Food Drop
description:
Food and poop falls from the sky. Catch all the foods and don't let them fall to ground. Be careful not to catch poop. Let poop fall to ground and watch them become cash which you can use to buy various skins.

Instructions
- Catch food
- Avoid poop
- Collect cash

Features
- Hi Scores
- Unlockable skins

Controls
- Tilt your phone to move left or right
